name: Scrambled Transmission (V)
Lore: 'The Rebel Alliance employs sophisticated jamming technology to block Imperial communications.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Unless you have 13 or more cards in hand, opponent may not peek at or remove those cards (except with Monnok). Once per turn, may take Logistical Delay into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, peek at a card placed face down by You''re A Slave?, or lose 2 Force to cancel a Political Effect. (Immune to Alter.)',
